NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: Friends, the forge at <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color> is asking for one last shipment of ore to be delivered to them.
2
1
CYCAD: Isn't the construction of <color=lightblue>Ash Twin's</color> protective shell complete? What will this new shipment of ore be used for?
3 2
COLEUS: In the construction of the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> of course!
4 3
COLEUS: Even though it was formed here, the ore still requires treatment at <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color> to reach its full capabilities.
5 4
CYCAD: That is sooner than I'd thought! Has a suitable site for the Sanctuary been chosen already?
6
5
COLEUS: Indeed! We have chosen to excavate a site in the planet's underground pools, which will allow us to make use of a quantum shard that travels there.
7
6
CYCAD: In that case, we will need to put extra eyes into carefully reinforcing the walls of the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> to protect it from groundwater.
8
7
CYCAD: Has the need for a new warp receiver been communicated to Poke yet?
9
8
OENO: That won't be necessary! We should be able to work without a warp receiver thanks to the <color=orange>new projection stones</color> Daz has engineered.
10
9
CYCAD: What? But how will anyone enter the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> once it is sealed, without a warp receiver installed inside?
11
10
OENO: You should visit the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> to learn about Daz's work, Cycad! We will be using his invention to access the <color=orange>Sanctuary.</color>
12
11
CYCAD: If it means the <color=orange>Sanctuary's</color> construction will be more expedient, I have no qualms! When shall we begin our work?
13
12
COLEUS: I am glad to hear your enthusiasm!
14
13
COLEUS: Is everyone rested up? Then let us begin our work shortly!
Campsite EX1 14
SY R2 9
SY R3 1
SY R4 6
Workshop R1 11
